scripts.setup:infra: docker compose up -d db redis solver && wait-on -t 120000 tcp:localhost:5432 tcp:localhost:6379 tcp:localhost:5001
scripts.setup:db: pnpm -C apps/api exec prisma migrate dev --schema prisma/schema.prisma && pnpm -C apps/api run db:seed
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n api,web "pnpm -C apps/api start:dev" "pnpm -C apps/web dev"
scripts.db:gen: pnpm -C apps/api exec prisma generate --schema prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate: pnpm -C apps/api exec prisma migrate dev --schema prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.reset:db: pnpm down && docker compose up -d db redis && wait-on tcp:localhost:5432 && pnpm db:migrate && pnpm db:seed
